item.title: 使用Jib为Java应用构建镜像
item.description: (pic from jib github) Jib是Google Container Tools中的一个工具. Jib builds optimized Docker and OCI images for your Java applications without a Docker daemon - and without deep mastery of Docker best-practices. It is available as plugins for Maven and Gradle and as a Java library. Jib无需D
